title: Riot points, SMS buying through verizon?
body:
A while ago, maybe a few weeks i have bought riot points from the mobile payment, but now for some reason it says verizon does not do mobile payments anymore? Any chance this is just a temporary problem because it is  my main way to buy riot points and  i am kind of bummed out. Right now when i try to purchase through my mobile number it just says an error has occurred.
Proof of purchases before, this month as well. WWW.imgur.com/a/x2tf6
It was working fine earlier this month but now their seems to be a problem ;/

replies.body: Verizon recently stopped supporting mobile payments with Boku, which is how our mobile payments are processed. Since they've decided to end their partnership, Verizon mobile payments are no longer accepted.
